pullRequest.title: Enable SonarCloud code scanning
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Add SonarCloud code scanning to Code Scan GitHub action job
Bump a few vulnerable dependencies
Fix a brittle test CompositeTransactionGeneratorTest
Split Java and JavaScript code scan into separate jobs to reduce conditional complexity

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #1175
Special notes for your reviewer:
https://sonarcloud.io/dashboard?id=hedera-mirror-node
Couldn't get code coverage to look correct so removed running tests for code scanning for now
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
Enable SonarCloud code scanning

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

afterCommit.message:
Enable SonarCloud code scanning

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

nodes.bodyText: Does this line need to be here or is it a dupe of line 77?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +158,7 @@
                         <!-- Jacoco prepare-agent builds some command-line params without -->
                         <!-- which jacoco will not instrument. Hence it is important to add -->
                         <!-- those command-line params here (${argLine} holds those params) -->
+                        <!--suppress UnresolvedMavenProperty -->

nodes.bodyText: nit: better yet a comment here saying "point to directory where sonar can import jacoco calculated coverage report from"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +74,13 @@
         <protobuf.version>3.13.0</protobuf.version>
         <release.version>${project.version}</release.version> <!-- Used to replace release versions in all files -->
         <release.chartVersion>0.9.0-rc1</release.chartVersion>
-        <embedded.testcontainers.version>1.85</embedded.testcontainers.version>
+        <!--suppress UnresolvedMavenProperty -->
+        <sonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths>
